article:
This is a 'list of [[Association football|football]] [[stadium]]s in
[[England]]', ranked in descending order of capacity.

There are an extremely large number of football stadiums and pitches in England,
so this list is not comprehensive. It includes:

* All 116 clubs in the top five tiers of the English football league system as
  of the 2013-14 season (Premier League, Football League Championship, Football
  League One, Football League Two and Conference National), with rankings within
  each league given.
* All stadiums, with a capacity of at least 5,000, of clubs playing in lower
  tiers of the National League System (tier indicated in brackets).

A person who has watched a match at the stadiums of all 92 Premier League and
Football League clubs in England may apply to join The 92 Club.
